Finance

Through a year-long process, the Horizon City Finance Department prepares and administers City’s Annual Budget.  City Staff submits the proposed Annual Budget to the City Council in September and the fiscal year begins on October 1.

* Management of financial planning and accounting for the City
* City payroll
* Administration of the City’s outstanding debt obligations
* Assisting City Staff in preparing the Annual Budget
* Investment of City funds for both short and long-term purposes
* Cash management services for the City.
* Completion of annual audit of all City funds and related compliance audits

**Accounts Payable Invoice Submission Email:**
[accountspayable@horizoncity.org](mailto:accountspayable@www.horizoncity.org)
